name: Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding
overview: Fly down slopes at speeds topping 90 miles per hour in this incredible Mode 7 ski simulation. Dodge moguls, dry patches, and skiers and snowboarders in the FREERIDE mode or engage in real competition. Try the lunatic DOWNHILL race where every turn could leave you with a face full of ice or the SLALOM and GIANT SLALOM modes, where you must overcome the ultimate challenge of dexterity, ripping through gates for your best time. Just don't end up a yard sale on this side of the slope!
